dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 9197 reviews from the 26th International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence (IJCAI 2017), made available by the program chair. Each review includes scores on various criteria such as originality, relevance, significance, quality of writing, and technical quality, rated on a scale from 1 to 10, along with overall recommendations.
dcterms:title: IJCAI 2017 Review Dataset
